title: One Piece: Unlimited World Red – Deluxe Edition
body:
One Piece: Unlimited World Red – Deluxe Edition


Genres/Tags: Action, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Ganbarion / Namco Bandai Games
Languages: ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 10.6 GB
Repack Size: 7.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on One.Piece.Unlimited.World.Red.Deluxe.Edition-CODEX ISO release: codex-one.piece.unlimited.world.red.deluxe.edition.iso (11,376,164,864 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.6 to 7.8 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~15 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~30 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~1 hour on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

A remaster of the latest installment of the “Unlimited” series, with over 50 DLC’s included..

An Original Story & Original Characters created by Eichiiro Oda.

Take part in epic fights against famous bosses up until the Dressrosa Chapter.

The Battle Coliseum Mode will allow players to show their skills in this dangerous Arena.

All the Straw-Hat crew members will be playable.
